ST LIS3L02 3-axis I2C Accelerometer Library (lis3l02.c)
[Drivers (for external hardware)] 

 #include "lis3l02.h"
Overview
This library provides an interface to the ST LIS3L02 integrated 3-axis accelerometer. The LIS3L02 has a built-in A/D converter to capture analog acceleration data and make it available over an I2C interface.
